languages.text: {n}Смущенно спрятав глаза, Авель практически застенчиво произносит:{/n} "Охота. Охотник идет".
{n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."
languages.original_text: {n}Смущенно спрятав глаза, Авель практически застенчиво произносит:{/n} "Охота. Охотник идет".

languages.text: {n}アベルはうろたえて目をそらすと、まるで気後れするかのように口を開く。{/n}「狩りだ。ハンターがやってくる」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルはうろたえて目をそらすと、まるで気後れするかのように口を開く。{/n}「狩りだ。ハンターがやってくる」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯窘迫地移开了目光，几乎以羞赧的声音开了口。{/n}“这里发生了一场狩猎。猎手来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯窘迫地移开了目光，几乎以羞赧的声音开了口。{/n}“这里发生了一场狩猎。猎手来了。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel détourne le regard avant de répondre timidement, l'air légèrement embarrassé :{/n} « Une chasse. Le chasseur arrive. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel détourne le regard avant de répondre timidement, l'air légèrement embarrassé :{/n} « Une chasse. Le chasseur arrive. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, avergonzado, aparta la mirada y dice, casi con timidez:{/n} «Una cacería. El cazador se acerca».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel, avergonzado, aparta la mirada y dice, casi con timidez:{/n} «Una cacería. El cazador se acerca».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel wendet beschämt den Blick ab und sagt fast schüchtern: {/n}"Eine Jagd. Der Hunter kommt."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel wendet beschämt den Blick ab und sagt fast schüchtern: {/n}"Eine Jagd. Der Hunter kommt."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, utanç içinde gözlerini kaçırıp ürkek bir tavırla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bir av. Avcı yaklaşıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel averts his eyes in embarrassment and says, almost shyly,{/n} "A hunt. The hunter is coming."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel utanç içinde gözlerini kaçırıyor ve ürkek bir tavırla konuşuyor:{/n} "Bir av. Avcı yaklaşıyor."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
